channel.title: My personal space
channel.description: Recent content on My personal space

item.title: Here you are!
item.description: Hi, there. If you’re reading this that means that you’ve ended up in my personal blog. Welcome! I’ll try to keep it short and interesting for both of us. In the past few years, I’ve got fascinated by the topic of pure functional programming. I was lucky enough to see it being applied in real-world projects, I learned a lot from people practising it at their everyday work. And today, I believe I grasped enough knowledge on this topic for me to share it with you as a series of educative blog posts.
